plantuml_diagram:
@startuml
!define AWSPuml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/awslabs/aws-icons-for-plantuml/v20.0/dist
!include AWSPuml/AWSCommon.puml

title Notes WebApp (Static) - High-Level Deployment Architecture

skinparam shadowing false
skinparam componentStyle rectangle
skinparam wrapWidth 220
skinparam maxMessageSize 120

actor "End User" as user

cloud "Internet" as internet

node "AWS Cloud" as aws {
  node "Kubernetes Cluster (EKS or managed K8s)" as k8s {
    node "Namespace: notes-webapp" as ns {
      node "Service: notes-webapp\nType: LoadBalancer\nPort 5000 -> TargetPort 5000\n(ALB annotations)" as svc

      node "Deployment: notes-webapp\nReplicas: 2" as deploy {
        node "Pod (x2)" as pod {
          artifact "Container Image\nnginx:alpine + static HTML/CSS/JS" as img
          component "Nginx\nStatic Web Serving" as nginx
        }
      }
    }
  }

  node "External Load Balancer\n(AWS ALB provisioned by Service)" as alb

  database "Container Registry\n(Docker Hub / GHCR)" as registry
}

node "CI/CD" as cicd {
  component "GitHub Actions\n- build & push image (GHCR/Docker Hub)\n- GitHub Pages deploy (optional)\n- cosign signing" as gha
  component "Jenkins Pipeline\n- build/test\n- scan (Trivy, Dependency-Check, Docker Scout, ZAP)\n- quality gate (SonarQube)\n- deploy (kubectl/terraform)" as jenkins

  component "SonarQube" as sonarqube
  component "Security/Scanning Tools\nTrivy, OWASP DC, Docker Scout, ZAP" as scanners
  component "Issue/Notification Integrations\nJira, Email" as notify
}

user --> internet
internet --> alb : HTTPS
alb --> svc : forwards
svc --> nginx : HTTP :5000
nginx --> img : runs from

gha --> registry : push image
jenkins --> registry : push/pull image

registry --> deploy : image pull

jenkins --> k8s : kubectl apply/rollout
jenkins --> sonarqube : code analysis
jenkins --> scanners : security scans
jenkins --> notify : tickets/alerts

note right of gha
Workflows:
- docker-image.yml / docker-publish.yml
- static.yml (GitHub Pages)
end note

note right of svc
Service type LoadBalancer
creates external LB (ALB)
end note

@enduml

architecture_description:
## High-level architecture

### Runtime / Serving path
- **Static Notes WebApp (HTML/CSS/JS)** is packaged into a **Docker image** based on **nginx:alpine**.
- The app runs on a **Kubernetes cluster** (likely AWS EKS or another managed K8s) as a **Deployment** with **2 replicas**.
- A **Kubernetes Service (type: LoadBalancer)** exposes the pods on **port 5000 -> targetPort 5000**.
- Because the Service is `LoadBalancer` and includes AWS load balancer annotations, an **external AWS Application Load Balancer (ALB)** is provisioned to route Internet traffic to the Service.

### Container image supply chain
- A **Container Registry** (Docker Hub and/or GitHub Container Registry `ghcr.io`) stores the built image (e.g., `yash5090/notes-webapp:latest`).
- The Kubernetes Deployment **pulls the image** from the registry during rollout and scaling.

### CI/CD and quality/security controls
- **GitHub Actions** workflows:
  - Build and push container images (Buildx + login/metadata actions).
  - Optional static site publishing via **GitHub Pages**.
  - Image signing via **Sigstore cosign**.
- **Jenkins Pipeline** provides a more comprehensive CI/CD path:
  - Build/test steps (tooling references include JDK 17, Node 16).
  - Code quality via **SonarQube**.
  - Security scanning via **Trivy**, **OWASP Dependency-Check**, **Docker Scout**, and **OWASP ZAP**.
  - Deployment automation using **kubectl** (and potentially **Terraform** for infra).
  - Integrations for operational feedback via **Jira** and **Email**.

### Key relationships
- End users access the application over the Internet → **ALB** → **K8s Service** → **Nginx pods**.
- CI systems (GitHub Actions/Jenkins) publish images to the registry; the cluster pulls those images for deployments.
- Jenkins orchestrates quality gates, security scans, and cluster deployments, with notifications to Jira/email.
